phrases.original: When you send an invite by text message or e-mail, by default your message will only contain the name of the event and a link for the recipient to click on. But you can add additional text below the link, for a more personal touch.
phrases.translated: When you send an invite by text message or e-mail, by default your message will only contain the name of the event and a link for the recipient to click on. But you can add additional text below the link, for a more personal touch.

phrases.original: Hi, it's {NAME}. It was nice talking with you. I hope you can join us.
phrases.translated: Hi, it's {NAME}. It was nice talking with you. I hope you can join us.

phrases.original: You can be immediately notified if someone you invited views or interacts with their invite. This allows you to follow up with them in a timely manner.
phrases.translated: You can be immediately notified if someone you invited views or interacts with their invite. This allows you to follow up with them in a timely manner.

phrases.original: Note: disabling either setting above will apply to notifications for every invite you have sent. A less drastic alternative is to enable notifications, but unsubscribe from the ones about a specific invite. The link to do so is found through the My Invites page. Just click on the pertinent invite and select the option to unsubscribe.
phrases.translated: Note: disabling either setting above will apply to notifications for every invite you have sent. A less drastic alternative is to enable notifications, but unsubscribe from the ones about a specific invite. The link to do so is found through the My Invites page. Just click on the pertinent invite and select the option to unsubscribe.

phrases.original: When you send an invite, you can automatically add the recipient to your Follow Up List. This setting only applies to future invites, and not retroactively.
phrases.translated: When you send an invite, you can automatically add the recipient to your Follow Up List. This setting only applies to future invites, and not retroactively.

phrases.original: Automatically add invite recipients to my Follow Up List
phrases.translated: Automatically add invite recipients to my Follow Up List

phrases.original: You have your own personal Web page on the Invites app, known as a profile, which is accessible to the public. It has a unique address (shown below), which you can promote for evangelistic purposes in several ways:
phrases.translated: You have your own personal Web page on the Invites app, known as a profile, which is accessible to the public. It has a unique address (shown below), which you can promote for evangelistic purposes in several ways:

phrases.original: Here's the address to your public profile:
phrases.translated: Here's the address to your public profile:

phrases.original: Your public profile is a potential way to evangelize passively, because it lets people discover our events at their own convenience and initiative. All of the events that you're normally able to send are listed there for them.
phrases.translated: Your public profile is a potential way to evangelize passively, because it lets people discover our events at their own convenience and initiative. All of the events that you're normally able to send are listed there for them.

phrases.original: The following settings allow you to customize your public profile:
phrases.translated: The following settings allow you to customize your public profile:
